member.name: T:AForge.Math.Complex
member.summary: Complex number wrapper class.

remarks.para: The class encapsulates complex number and provides set of different operators to manipulate it, lake adding, subtractio, multiplication, etc.
Sample usage:

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Complex.Re
member.summary: Real part of the complex number.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Complex.Im
member.summary: Imaginary part of the complex number.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Complex.Zero
member.summary: A double-precision complex number that represents zero.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Complex.One
member.summary: A double-precision complex number that represents one.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Complex.I
member.summary: A double-precision complex number that represents the squere root of (-1).

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Complex.Magnitude
member.summary: Magnitude value of the complex number.

remarks.para: Magnitude of the complex number, which equals to Sqrt( Re * Re + Im * Im ).

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Complex.Phase
member.summary: Phase value of the complex number.

remarks.para: Phase of the complex number, which equals to Atan( Im / Re ).

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Complex.SquaredMagnitude
member.summary: Squared magnitude value of the complex number.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.#ctor(AForge.Math.Complex)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Add(AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex)
member.summary: Adds two complex numbers.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the sum of specified complex numbers.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Add(AForge.Math.Complex,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds scalar value to a complex number.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the sum of specified complex number and scalar value.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Add(AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex@)
member.summary: Adds two complex numbers and puts the result into the third complex number.
member.param: A instance to hold the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Add(AForge.Math.Complex,System.Double,AForge.Math.Complex@)
member.summary: Adds scalar value to a complex number and puts the result into another complex number.
member.param: A instance to hold the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Subtract(AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex)
member.summary: Subtracts one complex number from another.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the subtraction result (a - b).

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Subtract(AForge.Math.Complex,System.Double)
member.summary: Subtracts a scalar from a complex number.
member.param: A scalar value to be subtracted.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the subtraction result (a - s).

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Subtract(System.Double,AForge.Math.Complex)
member.summary: Subtracts a complex number from a scalar value.
member.param: A scalar value to subtract from.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the subtraction result (s - a).

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Subtract(AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex@)
member.summary: Subtracts one complex number from another and puts the result in the third complex number.
member.param: A instance to hold the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Subtract(AForge.Math.Complex,System.Double,AForge.Math.Complex@)
member.summary: Subtracts a scalar value from a complex number and puts the result into another complex number.
member.param: A scalar value to be subtracted.
A instance to hold the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Subtract(System.Double,AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex@)
member.summary: Subtracts a complex number from a scalar value and puts the result into another complex number.
member.param: A scalar value to subtract from.
A instance to hold the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Multiply(AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex)
member.summary: Multiplies two complex numbers.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the result of multiplication.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Multiply(AForge.Math.Complex,System.Double)
member.summary: Multiplies a complex number by a scalar value.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the result of multiplication.

member.summary: Multiplies two complex numbers and puts the result in a third complex number.
member.param: A instance to hold the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Multiply(AForge.Math.Complex,System.Double,AForge.Math.Complex@)
member.summary: Multiplies a complex number by a scalar value and puts the result into another complex number.
member.param: A instance to hold the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Divide(AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex)
member.summary: Divides one complex number by another complex number.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Divide(AForge.Math.Complex,System.Double)
member.summary: Divides a complex number by a scalar value.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Divide(System.Double,AForge.Math.Complex)
member.summary: Divides a scalar value by a complex number.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Divide(AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex@)
member.summary: Divides one complex number by another complex number and puts the result in a third complex number.
member.param: A instance to hold the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Divide(AForge.Math.Complex,System.Double,AForge.Math.Complex@)
member.summary: Divides a complex number by a scalar value and puts the result into another complex number.
member.param: A instance to hold the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Divide(System.Double,AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex@)
member.summary: Divides a scalar value by a complex number and puts the result into another complex number.
member.param: A instance to hold the result.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Negate(AForge.Math.Complex)
member.summary: Negates a complex number.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the negated values.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.ApproxEqual(AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex)
member.summary: Tests whether two complex numbers are approximately equal using default tolerance value.
member.returns: Return if the two vectors are approximately equal or otherwise.

remarks.para: The default tolerance value, which is used for the test, equals to 8.8817841970012523233891E-16.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.ApproxEqual(AForge.Math.Complex,AForge.Math.Complex,System.Double)
member.summary: Tests whether two complex numbers are approximately equal given a tolerance value.
member.param: The tolerance value used to test approximate equality.

remarks.para: The default tolerance value, which is used for the test, equals to 8.8817841970012523233891E-16.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string to its equivalent.
member.param: A string representation of a complex number.
member.returns: Returns new instance that represents the complex number specified by the parameter.
member.exception: String representation of the complex number is not correctly formatted.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.TryParse(System.String,AForge.Math.Complex@)
member.summary: Try to convert the specified string to its equivalent.
member.param: A string representation of a complex number.
instance to output the result to.
member.returns: Returns boolean value that indicates if the parse was successful or not.

member.summary: Calculates natural (base e) logarithm of a complex number.

member.summary: Calculates exponent (e raised to the specified power) of a complex number.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the exponent of the specified complex number.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Complex.Tan(AForge.Math.Complex)
member.summary: Calculates Tangent value of the complex number.
member.returns: Returns new instance containing the Tangent value of the specified complex number.

member.summary: Returns the hashcode for this instance.

member.name: T:AForge.Math.FourierTransform
member.summary: Fourier transformation.
member.remarks: The class implements one dimensional and two dimensional Discrete and Fast Fourier Transformation.

member.name: T:AForge.Math.FourierTransform.Direction
member.summary: Fourier transformation direction.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.FourierTransform.Direction.Forward
member.summary: Forward direction of Fourier transformation.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.FourierTransform.Direction.Backward
member.summary: Backward direction of Fourier transformation.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.FourierTransform.DFT(AForge.Math.Complex[],AForge.Math.FourierTransform.Direction)
member.summary: One dimensional Discrete Fourier Transform.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.FourierTransform.DFT2(AForge.Math.Complex[0:,0:],AForge.Math.FourierTransform.Direction)
member.summary: Two dimensional Discrete Fourier Transform.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.FourierTransform.FFT(AForge.Math.Complex[],AForge.Math.FourierTransform.Direction)
member.summary: One dimensional Fast Fourier Transform.

para.note: The method accepts array of 2n size only, where n may vary in the [1, 14] range.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.FourierTransform.FFT2(AForge.Math.Complex[0:,0:],AForge.Math.FourierTransform.Direction)
member.summary: Two dimensional Fast Fourier Transform.

para.note: The method accepts array of 2n size only in each dimension, where n may vary in the [1, 14] range. For example, 16x16 array is valid, but 15x15 is not.

member.name: T:AForge.Math.Gaussian
member.summary: Gaussian function.

remarks.para: The class is used to calculate 1D and 2D Gaussian functions for specified (s) value:
remarks.code:
1-D: f(x) = exp( x * x / ( -2 * s * s ) ) / ( s * sqrt( 2 * PI ) )
2-D: f(x, y) = exp( x * x + y * y / ( -2 * s * s ) ) / ( s * s * 2 * PI )

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Gaussian.Sigma
member.summary: Sigma value.

remarks.para: Sigma property of Gaussian function.
Default value is set to 1. Minimum allowed value is 0.00000001.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Gaussian.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Gaussian.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Gaussian.Function(System.Double)
member.summary: 1-D Gaussian function.
member.returns: Returns function's value at point .

remarks.para: The function calculates 1-D Gaussian function:
remarks.code: f(x) = exp( x * x / ( -2 * s * s ) ) / ( s * sqrt( 2 * PI ) )

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Gaussian.Function2D(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: 2-D Gaussian function.
member.returns: Returns function's value at point (, ).

remarks.para: The function calculates 2-D Gaussian function:
remarks.code: f(x, y) = exp( x * x + y * y / ( -2 * s * s ) ) / ( s * s * 2 * PI )

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Gaussian.Kernel(System.Int32)
member.summary: 1-D Gaussian kernel.
member.returns: Returns 1-D Gaussian kernel of the specified size.

remarks.para: The function calculates 1-D Gaussian kernel, which is array of Gaussian function's values in the [-r, r] range of x value, where r=floor(/2).

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Gaussian.Kernel2D(System.Int32)
member.summary: 2-D Gaussian kernel.
member.returns: Returns 2-D Gaussian kernel of specified size.

remarks.para: The function calculates 2-D Gaussian kernel, which is array of Gaussian function's values in the [-r, r] range of x,y values, where r=floor(/2).

member.name: T:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3
member.summary: A structure representing 3x3 matrix.

remarks.para: The structure incapsulates elements of a 3x3 matrix and provides some operations with it.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.V00
member.summary: Row 0 column 0 element of the matrix.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.V01
member.summary: Row 0 column 1 element of the matrix.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.V02
member.summary: Row 0 column 2 element of the matrix.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.V10
member.summary: Row 1 column 0 element of the matrix.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.V11
member.summary: Row 1 column 1 element of the matrix.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.V12
member.summary: Row 1 column 2 element of the matrix.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.V20
member.summary: Row 2 column 0 element of the matrix.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.V21
member.summary: Row 2 column 1 element of the matrix.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.V22
member.summary: Row 2 column 2 element of the matrix.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.Identity
member.summary: Provides an identity matrix with all diagonal elements set to 1.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.Determinant
member.summary: Calculates determinant of the matrix.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.ToArray
member.summary: Returns array representation of the matrix.
member.returns: Returns array which contains all elements of the matrix in the row-major order.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.CreateRotationY(System.Single)
member.summary: Creates rotation matrix around Y axis.
member.param: Rotation angle around Y axis in radians.
member.returns: Returns rotation matrix to rotate an object around Y axis.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.CreateRotationX(System.Single)
member.summary: Creates rotation matrix around X axis.
member.param: Rotation angle around X axis in radians.
member.returns: Returns rotation matrix to rotate an object around X axis.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.CreateRotationZ(System.Single)
member.summary: Creates rotation matrix around Z axis.
member.param: Rotation angle around Z axis in radians.
member.returns: Returns rotation matrix to rotate an object around Z axis.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.CreateFromYawPitchRoll(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates rotation matrix to rotate an object around X, Y and Z axes.
member.param: Rotation angle around Y axis in radians.
Rotation angle around X axis in radians.
Rotation angle around Z axis in radians.
member.returns: Returns rotation matrix to rotate an object around all 3 axes.

para.note: The routine assumes roll-pitch-yaw rotation order, when creating rotation matrix, i.e. an object is first rotated around Z axis, then around X axis and finally around Y axis.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.ExtractYawPitchRoll(System.Single@,System.Single@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Extract rotation angles from the rotation matrix.
member.param: Extracted rotation angle around Y axis in radians.
Extracted rotation angle around X axis in radians.
Extracted rotation angle around Z axis in radians.

para.note: The routine assumes roll-pitch-yaw rotation order when extracting rotation angle. Using extracted angles with the should provide same rotation matrix.
The method assumes the provided matrix represent valid rotation matrix.

remarks.para: Sample usage:

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.CreateFromRows(AForge.Math.Vector3,AForge.Math.Vector3,AForge.Math.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates a matrix from 3 rows specified as vectors.
member.param: First row of the matrix to create.
Second row of the matrix to create.
Third row of the matrix to create.
member.returns: Returns a matrix from specified rows.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.CreateFromColumns(AForge.Math.Vector3,AForge.Math.Vector3,AForge.Math.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates a matrix from 3 columns specified as vectors.
member.param: First column of the matrix to create.
Second column of the matrix to create.
Third column of the matrix to create.
member.returns: Returns a matrix from specified columns.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.CreateDiagonal(AForge.Math.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates a diagonal matrix using the specified vector as diagonal elements.
member.param: Vector to use for diagonal elements of the matrix.
member.returns: Returns a diagonal matrix.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.GetRow(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get row of the matrix.
member.returns: Returns specified row of the matrix as a vector.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.GetColumn(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get column of the matrix.
member.returns: Returns specified column of the matrix as a vector.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.op_Multiply(AForge.Math.Matrix3x3,AForge.Math.Matrix3x3)
member.summary: Multiplies two specified matrices.
member.returns: Return new matrix, which the result of multiplication of the two specified matrices.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.Multiply(AForge.Math.Matrix3x3,AForge.Math.Matrix3x3)
member.summary: Multiplies two specified matrices.
member.returns: Return new matrix, which the result of multiplication of the two specified matrices.

member.summary: Adds corresponding components of two matrices.
member.param: The matrix to add to the first matrix.
member.returns: Returns a matrix which components are equal to sum of corresponding components of the two specified matrices.

member.summary: Adds corresponding components of two matrices.
member.param: The matrix to add to the first matrix.
member.returns: Returns a matrix which components are equal to sum of corresponding components of the two specified matrices.

member.summary: Subtracts corresponding components of two matrices.

member.returns: Returns a matrix which components are equal to difference of corresponding components of the two specified matrices.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.Subtract(AForge.Math.Matrix3x3,AForge.Math.Matrix3x3)
member.summary: Subtracts corresponding components of two matrices.
member.param: The matrix to subtract from the first matrix.
member.returns: Returns a matrix which components are equal to difference of corresponding components of the two specified matrices.

member.summary: Multiplies matrix by the specified factor.

member.returns: Returns new matrix with all components equal to corresponding components of the specified matrix multiples by the specified factor.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.Multiply(AForge.Math.Matrix3x3,System.Single)
member.summary: Multiplies matrix by the specified factor.
member.param: Factor to multiple the specified matrix by.
member.returns: Returns new matrix with all components equal to corresponding components of the specified matrix multiples by the specified factor.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.op_Addition(AForge.Math.Matrix3x3,System.Single)
member.summary: Adds specified value to all components of the specified matrix.
member.param: Value to add to all components of the specified matrix.
member.returns: Returns new matrix with all components equal to corresponding components of the specified matrix increased by the specified value.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.Add(AForge.Math.Matrix3x3,System.Single)
member.summary: Adds specified value to all components of the specified matrix.
member.param: Value to add to all components of the specified matrix.
member.returns: Returns new matrix with all components equal to corresponding components of the specified matrix increased by the specified value.

member.summary: Tests whether the matrix equals to the specified object.
member.param: The object to test equality with.
member.returns: Returns if the matrix equals to the specified object or otherwise.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hashcode for this instance.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.Transpose
member.summary: Transpose the matrix, AT.
member.returns: Return a matrix which equals to transposition of this matrix.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.MultiplySelfByTranspose
member.summary: Multiply the matrix by its transposition, A*AT.
member.returns: Returns a matrix which is the result of multiplying this matrix by its transposition.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.MultiplyTransposeBySelf
member.summary: Multiply transposition of this matrix by itself, AT*A.
member.returns: Returns a matrix which is the result of multiplying this matrix's transposition by itself.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.Adjugate
member.summary: Calculate adjugate of the matrix, adj(A).
member.returns: Returns adjugate of the matrix.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.Inverse
member.summary: Calculate inverse of the matrix, A-1.
member.returns: Returns inverse of the matrix.
member.exception: Cannot calculate inverse of the matrix since it is singular.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.PseudoInverse
member.summary: Calculate pseudo inverse of the matrix, A+.
member.returns: Returns pseudo inverse of the matrix.

remarks.para: The pseudo inverse of the matrix is calculate through its as V*E+*UT.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix3x3.SVD(AForge.Math.Matrix3x3@,AForge.Math.Vector3@,AForge.Math.Matrix3x3@)
member.summary: Calculate Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) of the matrix, such as A=U*E*VT.
member.param: Output parameter which gets 3x3 U matrix.
Output parameter which gets diagonal elements of the E matrix.
Output parameter which gets 3x3 V matrix.

remarks.para:
Having components U, E and V the source matrix can be reproduced using below code:
Matrix3x3 source = u * Matrix3x3.Diagonal( e ) * v.Transpose( );

member.summary: Provides an identity matrix with all diagonal elements set to 1.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix4x4.ToArray
member.summary: Returns array representation of the matrix.
member.returns: Returns array which contains all elements of the matrix in the row-major order.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix4x4.CreateRotationY(System.Single)
member.summary: Creates rotation matrix around Y axis.
member.param: Rotation angle around Y axis in radians.
member.returns: Returns rotation matrix to rotate an object around Y axis.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix4x4.CreateRotationX(System.Single)
member.summary: Creates rotation matrix around X axis.
member.param: Rotation angle around X axis in radians.
member.returns: Returns rotation matrix to rotate an object around X axis.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix4x4.CreateRotationZ(System.Single)
member.summary: Creates rotation matrix around Z axis.
member.param: Rotation angle around Z axis in radians.
member.returns: Returns rotation matrix to rotate an object around Z axis.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix4x4.CreateFromYawPitchRoll(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates rotation matrix to rotate an object around X, Y and Z axes.
member.param: Rotation angle around Y axis in radians.
Rotation angle around X axis in radians.
Rotation angle around Z axis in radians.
member.returns: Returns rotation matrix to rotate an object around all 3 axes.

para.note: The routine assumes roll-pitch-yaw rotation order, when creating rotation matrix, i.e. an object is first rotated around Z axis, then around X axis and finally around Y axis.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix4x4.ExtractYawPitchRoll(System.Single@,System.Single@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Extract rotation angles from the rotation matrix.
member.param: Extracted rotation angle around Y axis in radians.
Extracted rotation angle around X axis in radians.
Extracted rotation angle around Z axis in radians.

para.note: The routine assumes roll-pitch-yaw rotation order when extracting rotation angle. Using extracted angles with the should provide same rotation matrix.
The method assumes the provided matrix represent valid rotation matrix.

remarks.para: Sample usage:

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix4x4.CreateFromRotation(AForge.Math.Matrix3x3)
member.summary: Creates 4x4 tranformation matrix from 3x3 rotation matrix.
member.returns: Returns 4x4 rotation matrix.

remarks.para: The source 3x3 rotation matrix is copied into the top left corner of the result 4x4 matrix, i.e. it represents 0th, 1st and 2nd row/column. The element is set to 1 and the rest elements of 3rd row and 3rd column are set to zeros.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix4x4.CreateTranslation(AForge.Math.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates translation matrix for the specified movement amount.
member.param: Vector which set direction and amount of movement.
member.returns: Returns translation matrix.

remarks.para: The specified vector is copied to the 3rd column of the result matrix. All diagonal elements are set to 1. The rest of matrix is initialized with zeros.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix4x4.CreateLookAt(AForge.Math.Vector3,AForge.Math.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates a view matrix for the specified camera position and target point.
member.param: Target point towards which camera is pointing.
member.returns: Returns a view matrix.

remarks.para: Camera's "up" vector is supposed to be (0, 1, 0).

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Matrix4x4.CreatePerspective(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a perspective projection matrix.
member.param: Width of the view volume at the near view plane.
Height of the view volume at the near view plane.
Distance to the near view plane.
Distance to the far view plane.
member.returns: Return a perspective projection matrix.
member.exception: Both near and far view planes' distances must be greater than zero.
Near plane must be closer than the far plane.

member.name: T:AForge.Math.Metrics.IDistance
member.summary: Interface for distance metric algorithms.

remarks.para: The interface defines a set of methods implemented by distance metric algorithms. These algorithms typically take a set of points and return a distance measure of the x and y coordinates. In this case, the points are represented by two vectors.
Distance metric algorithms are used in many machine learning algorithms e.g K-nearest neighbor and K-means clustering.
For additional details about distance metrics, documentation of the particular algorithms should be studied.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Metrics.IDistance.GetDistance(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Returns distance between two N-dimensional double vectors.
member.returns: Returns distance measurement determined by the given algorithm.

member.name: T:AForge.Math.Metrics.ISimilarity
member.summary: Interface for similarity algorithms.

remarks.para: The interface defines a set of methods implemented by similarity and correlation algorithms. These algorithms typically take a set of points and return a similarity score for the two vectors.
Similarity and correlation algorithms are used in many machine learning and collaborative filtering algorithms.
For additional details about similarity metrics, documentation of the particular algorithms should be studied.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Metrics.ISimilarity.GetSimilarityScore(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Returns similarity score for two N-dimensional double vectors.
member.returns: Returns similarity score determined by the given algorithm.

member.name: T:AForge.Math.PerlinNoise
member.summary: Perlin noise function.

remarks.para: The class implements 1-D and 2-D Perlin noise functions, which represent sum of several smooth noise functions with different frequency and amplitude. The description of Perlin noise function and its calculation may be found on Hugo Elias's page.

The number of noise functions, which comprise the resulting Perlin noise function, is set by property. Amplitude and frequency values for each octave start from values, which are set by and properties.
Sample usage (clouds effect):

member.name: P:AForge.Math.PerlinNoise.InitFrequency
member.summary: Initial frequency.

remarks.para:
The property sets initial frequency of the first octave. Frequencies for next octaves are calculated using the next equation:
frequencyi = * 2i, where i = [0, ).
Default value is set to 1.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.PerlinNoise.InitAmplitude
member.summary: Initial amplitude.

remarks.para:
The property sets initial amplitude of the first octave. Amplitudes for next octaves are calculated using the next equation:
amplitudei = * i, where i = [0, ).
Default value is set to 1.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.PerlinNoise.Persistence
member.summary: Persistence value.

remarks.para: The property sets so called persistence value, which controls the way how amplitude is calculated for each octave comprising the Perlin noise function.
Default value is set to 0.65.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.PerlinNoise.Octaves
member.summary: Number of octaves, [1, 32].

remarks.para: The property sets the number of noise functions, which sum up the resulting Perlin noise function.
Default value is set to 4.

member.summary: Calculates power of 2.
member.returns: Returns specified power of 2 in the case if power is in the range of [0, 30]. Otherwise returns 0.

member.summary: Checks if the specified integer is power of 2.

member.name: T:AForge.Math.Vector3
member.summary: 3D Vector structure with X, Y and Z coordinates.

remarks.para: The structure incapsulates X, Y and Z coordinates of a 3D vector and provides some operations with it.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Vector3.X
member.summary: X coordinate of the vector.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Vector3.Y
member.summary: Y coordinate of the vector.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Vector3.Z
member.summary: Z coordinate of the vector.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector3.Max
member.summary: Returns maximum value of the vector.

remarks.para: Returns maximum value of all 3 vector's coordinates.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector3.Min
member.summary: Returns minimum value of the vector.

remarks.para: Returns minimum value of all 3 vector's coordinates.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector3.MaxIndex
member.summary: Returns index of the coordinate with maximum value.

remarks.para: Returns index of the coordinate, which has the maximum value - 0 for X, 1 for Y or 2 for Z.

para.note: If there are multiple coordinates which have the same maximum value, the property returns smallest index.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector3.MinIndex
member.summary: Returns index of the coordinate with minimum value.

remarks.para: Returns index of the coordinate, which has the minimum value - 0 for X, 1 for Y or 2 for Z.

para.note: If there are multiple coordinates which have the same minimum value, the property returns smallest index.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector3.Norm
member.summary: Returns vector's norm.

remarks.para: Returns Euclidean norm of the vector, which is a square root of the sum: X2+Y2+Z2.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector3.Square
member.summary: Returns square of the vector's norm.

remarks.para: Return X2+Y2+Z2, which is a square of vector's norm or a dot product of this vector with itself.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Vector3.Normalize
member.summary: Normalizes the vector by dividing its all coordinates with the vector's norm.
member.returns: Returns the value of vectors norm before normalization.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Vector3.Inverse
member.summary: Inverse the vector.
member.returns: Returns a vector with all coordinates equal to 1.0 divided by the value of corresponding coordinate in this vector (or equal to 0.0 if this vector has corresponding coordinate also set to 0.0).

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Vector3.Abs
member.summary: Calculate absolute values of the vector.
member.returns: Returns a vector with all coordinates equal to absolute values of this vector's coordinates.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Vector3.Cross(AForge.Math.Vector3,AForge.Math.Vector3)
member.summary: Calculates cross product of two vectors.
member.param: First vector to use for cross product calculation.
Second vector to use for cross product calculation.
member.returns: Returns cross product of the two specified vectors.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Vector3.Dot(AForge.Math.Vector3,AForge.Math.Vector3)
member.summary: Calculates dot product of two vectors.
member.param: First vector to use for dot product calculation.
Second vector to use for dot product calculation.
member.returns: Returns dot product of the two specified vectors.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Vector3.ToVector4
member.summary: Converts the vector to a 4D vector.
member.returns: Returns 4D vector which is an extension of the 3D vector.

remarks.para: The method returns a 4D vector which has X, Y and Z coordinates equal to the coordinates of this 3D vector and W coordinate set to 1.0.

member.name: T:AForge.Math.Vector4
member.summary: 4D Vector structure with X, Y, Z and W coordinates.

remarks.para: The structure incapsulates X, Y, Z and W coordinates of a 4D vector and provides some operations with it.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Vector4.X
member.summary: X coordinate of the vector.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Vector4.Y
member.summary: Y coordinate of the vector.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Vector4.Z
member.summary: Z coordinate of the vector.

member.name: F:AForge.Math.Vector4.W
member.summary: W coordinate of the vector.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector4.Max
member.summary: Returns maximum value of the vector.

remarks.para: Returns maximum value of all 4 vector's coordinates.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector4.Min
member.summary: Returns minimum value of the vector.

remarks.para: Returns minimum value of all 4 vector's coordinates.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector4.MaxIndex
member.summary: Returns index of the coordinate with maximum value.

remarks.para: Returns index of the coordinate, which has the maximum value - 0 for X, 1 for Y, 2 for Z or 3 for W.

para.note: If there are multiple coordinates which have the same maximum value, the property returns smallest index.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector4.MinIndex
member.summary: Returns index of the coordinate with minimum value.

remarks.para: Returns index of the coordinate, which has the minimum value - 0 for X, 1 for Y, 2 for Z or 3 for W.

para.note: If there are multiple coordinates which have the same minimum value, the property returns smallest index.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector4.Norm
member.summary: Returns vector's norm.

remarks.para: Returns Euclidean norm of the vector, which is a square root of the sum: X2+Y2+Z2+W2.

member.name: P:AForge.Math.Vector4.Square
member.summary: Returns square of the vector's norm.

remarks.para: Return X2+Y2+Z2+W2, which is a square of vector's norm or a dot product of this vector with itself.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Vector4.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the structure.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Vector4.#ctor(System.Single)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the structure.
member.param: Value, which is set to all 4 coordinates of the vector.

member.returns: A string representation of this object.

member.name: M:AForge.Math.Vector4.ToArray
member.summary: Returns array representation of the vector.
member.returns: Array with 4 values containing X/Y/Z/W coordinates.
